item.title: IIJ Global Solutions Singapore is now providing cloud monitoring services using CA Nimsoft Monitor for small and medium-sized businesses
item.description:
IIJ Global Solutions Singapore, a subsidiary of a major Japanese internet and network solutions company, Internet Initiative Japan (IIJ) Group, has incorporated CA Nimsoft Monitor from CA Technologies into its cloud solutions for small and medium-sized businesses. This addition allows IIJ Global Solutions Singapore to offer its clients extensive 24/7 monitoring and reporting services. Using this unified monitoring platform from CA Nimsoft Monitor, users can optimize resources, improve planning and investments, and reduce time spent on troubleshooting...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/iij-global-solutions-singapore-is-now-providing-cloud-monitoring-services-using-ca-nimsoft-monitor-for-small-and-medium-sized-businesses/
